resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104176</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104176</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085949</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading biographies and autobiographies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesebiographien und -autobiographien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biographies et autobiographies de lecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biografias e autobiographies da leitura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biografie ed autobiographies della lettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βιογραφίες και αυτοβιογραφίες ανάγνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Biografías y autobiografías de la lectura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">How good is that biography your students are reading? Here's how to make sure they get the most out of their reading and research.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie gut ist, daß Biographie, die Ihre 
Kursteilnehmer lesen? Ist hier, wie man sicherstellt, daß sie 
die die meisten aus ihrem Messwert und Forschung heraus erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combien bon est que biographie que vos étudiants 
lisent ? Voici comment s'assurer qu'ils obtiennent les la 
plupart hors de leur lecture et recherche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como bom é que biografia que seus estudantes 
estão lendo? É aqui como certificar-se que começam o a 
maioria fora de suas leitura e pesquisa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quanto buon è che biografia che i vostri allievi 
stanno leggendo? Qui è come assicurarsi che ottengono il la 
maggior parte dalla loro lettura e ricerca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς το αγαθό είναι εκείνη η βιογραφία οι σπουδαστές 
που σας διαβάζουν; Εδώ πώς να σιγουρευτούν παίρνουν οι 
περισσότερες από την ανάγνωση και την έρευνά τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo bueno es que biografía que sus estudiantes 
están leyendo? Aquí es cómo cerciorarse de que consiguen el 
la mayoría de su lectura e investigación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MELISSA THIBAULT
FN:MELISSA THIBAULT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085949</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104176</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/reading-biographies-and-autobiographies</uri>
